targets.expr:
(
(
( max_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_use_kwh"}[$__range]) - min_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_use_kwh"}[$__range]) )
- 
ignoring(entity, friendly_name) ( max_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_import_kwh"}[$__range]) - min_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_import_kwh"}[$__range]) )
- 
ignoring(entity, friendly_name) ( max_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_solar_kwh"}[$__range]) - min_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_solar_kwh"}[$__range]) )
) 
* - 1
) 
/ 
ignoring (entity, friendly_name) ( max_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_solar_kwh"}[$__range]) - min_over_time(homeassistant_sensor_energy_kwh{entity="sensor.emoncms_solar_kwh"}[$__range]) )
sum(homeassistant_sensor_power_w{entity="sensor.emoncms_import"}) and ((hour() >= 0 and hour() < 2) or (hour() >= 7 and hour() < 22))
sum(homeassistant_sensor_power_w{entity="sensor.emoncms_import"}) and ((hour() >= 22 and hour() < 24) or (hour() >= 2 and hour() < 7))
